definition: to seek knowledge/to study/to attend college
to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech
The path of learning can never be smooth./There is no royal road to learning. (idiom)
to seek a teacher desiring to study

sentences.english: The replier said that he went to a Chrisitan high school when he was young.
sentences.chinese: 回应当中的一位网友说到自己求学时的经历。

sentences.english: In school teach him it is far more honourable to fail than to cheat.
sentences.chinese: 教他求学时不及格比作弊来得刚正。

sentences.english: I study the way it seems a bit bitter ?
sentences.chinese: 我的求学之路好象有点苦呢？

sentences.english: Mr Wang Delin was obsessed with calligraphy from he began studying in Xi'an institute of geological.
sentences.chinese: 王德林先生早在西安地质学院求学时就迷恋上了书法。

sentences.english: I am support by my parents when I am study.
sentences.chinese: 我求学期间由父母供养。

sentences.english: I have gained a lot in a span of three years at CS College.
sentences.chinese: 在同创求学的这三年里，我学到了很多。

sentences.english: Has the student ever studied in an international school in the home country or in a school abroad?
sentences.chinese: 申请人曾否在原国家的国际学校或在海外地方求学？

sentences.english: South to work, school trackless recruitment seems to be the only way people can go nowhere else.
sentences.chinese: 南下打工，似乎是求学无路招工无门的人的惟一出路。

sentences.english: List a few teachers who aided your journey through school.
sentences.chinese: 列出在求学进程中助理副理过的几位教练。

sentences.english: During our school days on the road, I met like-minded students.
sentences.chinese: 在求学路上，我也遇到了志同道合的同学。

sentences.english: Educated in Beijing and Hunan, Mr Massimov is an expert on China.
sentences.chinese: 马西莫夫曾在北京和湖南求学，是个中国通。

sentences.english: In comparison, the path of my son's education is really smooth, which is the actual benefit he receives from the cultivation.
sentences.chinese: 反观儿子的求学路，很是顺利，修行的利益真实不虚。

sentences.english: Choosing the right option will make your journey more efficient and more economical.
sentences.chinese: 正确的选择会使你的求学之旅花费更少又事半功倍。

sentences.english: He was a Luo tribesman who grew up in Kenya and studied at Harvard.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位卢奥部落男子，成长在肯尼亚，求学于哈佛。

sentences.english: I was studying alone in Paris University when I was young。
sentences.chinese: 少女时期我在巴黎大学，孤独的过着求学的岁月。

sentences.english: Some of my professors tried to "humanize" the process.
sentences.chinese: 我的一些老师想把这一求学过程变得更人性化些。

definition: to study away from home or abroad (old)
to read a book/to study/to attend school
to major (in a field)/to study a specialty to obtain a higher degree
to look for a job/to seek employment
to leave one's native place, esp. against one's will (idiom)
